title: Riot refuses to refund and take responsibility for their mistake.
body: With the release of the MSI icons I excitedly went to the store to pick me up a fresh new icon but the store only offered it to me for 250 RP. I purchased 2 NA MSI icons for me and a friend for 500RP thinking that that's not a bad price if we do get the IP boost. Shortly after the client updated and made the icon 1IP. This was a glitch / bug that riot is responsible for. After submitting a ticket about it I was told by a support specialist that it is not riots policy to refund RP for summoner icons. Again, my RP was spent BECAUSE riot made a mistake, not me. This is outrages that they can refuse a refund for their mistake in their program. This is awful customer service and even worse business practices.
